name: Katou Megumi 5 in one（saekano anime+novel style）/加藤惠五合一lora(小说+动漫风)-FB

5 in one lora, the Instructions is followed

White shirt: ph_katou, katouhdlong, katouhd, 1girl, solo, shirt, brown eyes, bangs, brown hair, short hair, white shirt, short sleeves, bag, center frills, collared shirt, dress shirt, frills, puffy sleeves, shoulder bag, blunt bangs, handbag, puffy short sleeves

Pink jacket: ph_katou, katouhdlong, katouhd, 1girl, solo, brown hair, short hair, brown eyes, bag, open mouth, handbag, bangs, shoulder bag, blush, pink jacket,

T-shirt: ph_katou, katouhdlong, katouhd, 1girl, hat, paper fan, brown eyes, short hair, bangs, shirt, brown hair, beret, collarbone, short sleeves, white shirt

Necessary Trigger words: ph_katou, katouhdshort, 1girl, brown eyes, ponytail, short hair,
